import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import Swiper from'react-id-swiper';import'swiper/swiper.scss';import{Nav,Button}from'react-bootstrap-v5';import{connect}from'react-redux';import{fetchAllBrands}from'../../store/action/brandsAction';import{getFormattedMessage}from'../../shared/sharedMethod';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const swiperParams={slidesPerView:'auto',observer:true};const Brands=props=>{const{fetchAllBrands,brands,setBrand}=props;const[productBrandName,setProductBrandName]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{fetchAllBrands();},[]);//filter brand function
const onSelectBrand=brand=>{setBrand(brand);setProductBrandName(brand);};let brandsItem=brands&&brands.map((brand,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav.Item,{className:"button-list__item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"light",className:`custom-btn-size w-100 ${productBrandName===brand.id?'button-list__item-active text-white':''}`,onClick:()=>onSelectBrand(brand.id),children:brand.attributes.name})},index);});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Nav,{className:"button-list d-flex flex-nowrap",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav.Item,{className:"button-list__item me-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"light",className:`text-nowrap custom-btn-size ${productBrandName===0?'button-list__item-active text-white':''}`,onClick:()=>onSelectBrand(0),children:getFormattedMessage('pos-all.brands.label')})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Swiper,{...swiperParams,children:brandsItem})]});};const mapStateToProps=state=>{const{brands}=state;return{brands};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,{fetchAllBrands})(Brands);
